data.title: Homepage
data.text:
Publications

Agnieszka Karlinska, Cezary Rosiński, Marek Kubis, Patryk Hubar, and Jan Wieczorek. Using Bibliodata LODification to Create Metadata-Enriched Literary Corpora in Line with FAIR Principles. In Nicoletta Calzolari, Min-Yen Kan, Veronique Hoste, Alessandro Lenci, Sakriani Sakti, and Nianwen Xue, editors, Proceedings of the 2024 Joint International Conference on Computational Linguistics, Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC-COLING 2024), 17271–17284. Torino, Italia, May 2024. ELRA and ICCL. [ bib ] [ pdf ]

In Yuri Bizzoni, Stefania Degaetano-Ortlieb, Anna Kazantseva, and Stan Szpakowicz, editors, Proceedings of the 8th Joint SIGHUM Workshop on Computational Linguistics for Cultural Heritage, Social Sciences, Humanities and Literature (LaTeCH-CLfL 2024), 207–212. St. Julians, Malta, March 2024. Association for Computational Linguistics. [ bib ] [ pdf ]

IEEE, 2023. doi:10.15439/2023F6058. [ bib ] [ pdf ]

[ bib ] [ pdf ]

Towards a contextualised spatial-diachronic history of literature: mapping emotional representations of the city and the country in Polish fiction from 1864 to 1939. In Proceedings of the 6th Joint SIGHUM Workshop on Computational Linguistics for Cultural Heritage, Social Sciences, Humanities and Literature, 115–125. Gyeongju, Republic of Korea, October 2022. International Conference on Computational Linguistics. [ bib ] [ pdf ]

Challenges for Computer Science and Linguistics, 322–337. Cham, 2022. Springer International Publishing. This is a revised version of the conference paper under the same title published in Proceedings of the 9th Language and Technology Conference, LTC 2019, Poznan, Poland, May 17–19, 2019, Wydawnictwo Nauka i Innowacje, Poznań, Poland. doi:10.1007/978-3-031-05328-3_21. In Human Language Technology. Challenges for Computer Science and Linguistics, 259–276. Cham, 2022. Springer International Publishing. This is a revised version of the paper TSCC as a tool for lexical structure studies in application to literary output published in Proceedings of the 9th Language and Technology Conference, LTC 2019, Poznan, Poland, May 17–19, 2019, Wydawnictwo Nauka i Innowacje, Poznań, Poland. doi:10.1007/978-3-031-05328-3_17.
